remarks: The size of the set of (different!) words resulting by cyclically shifting an empty word is 0.  (Contributed by AV, 8-Nov-2018.)
statement:
cshwrepswhash1.m $e |- M = { w e. Word V | E. n e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ( W cyclShift n ) = w } $.
cshws0 $p |- ( W = (/) -> ( # ` M ) = 0 ) $.
$d V n w $.
$d W n w $.
